tool_description: The Top Animes of all time.
name: Top Anime
title: Top Anime

api_list.name: Get Anime by Rating ( 0 -> 5)
api_list.description: This Endpoint will return the anime name, link, and image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/3/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{rating_greater}/{rating_less}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Anime by Name
api_list.description: This EndPoint after providing the anime name will return the anime name, the link for more details, and the anime image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/naruto"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{animename}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Animes
api_list.description: This Endpoint will return all animes names, links for more details, and images.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-anime.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
